job.title: Lead Sitecore Developer
job.description:
Job Description-

·  7+ years of overall development experience with C#, ASP.net and web development.

· 5+ years of experience in Sitecore coding (including version 8.2 or 9+)

· Knowledge of Sitecore Forms, SXA/Helix/Habitat, xDB and TDS/Unicorn
· Experience of Solr search including customizing and deploying Solr Cloud
· Some NoSQL experience with Sitecore – MongoDB, Redis
· Expert level experience in the following technologies: ASP.Net MVC with Sitecore, RESTful services, Entity Framework, LINQ
· Experience with design patterns, Object-Oriented programming
· Proficient knowledge of code versioning tools such as Git, preference of using GitFlow mechanism.
· Strong knowledge of Continuous Integration concepts and experience using Bamboo/Jenkins
· Proficient soft-skills are essential day to day skills to help with client communication via email, conference calls, team chat etc.
· Knowledge, core understanding and experience of working in a team that made use of cloud networking including but not limited to network load balances, SSL, web apps, web servers, CDN’s, Web Application Firewalls etc.
· Experience of deploying to Azure web apps or web servers.
· Ability to constantly learn and stay in touch with evolving standards and development technologies
· Open to learn and work on other CMS, e.g., Optimizely and Core .Net
· Open to work in Application Support and Maintenance

Nice to have-

· Experience in working with Optimizely CMS
· Sitecore Certification
· Knowledge of other Sitecore CMS competitors is useful (AEM, EPiServer, etc)

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a Lead Sitecore Developer to join our team for a long-term project of more than 6 months. The ideal candidate should have extensive experience in .NET Framework, ASP.NET, MongoDB, Sitecore, Redis, CMS Development, Microsoft Azure, and ASP.NET MVC.

As a Lead Sitecore Developer, you will be responsible for leading the development and implementation of Sitecore-based solutions. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, define technical solutions, and ensure successful delivery of projects. Your expertise in Sitecore and related technologies will be crucial in designing and developing custom modules, components, and templates.

To apply for this position, please submit a detailed proposal describing how you can contribute to the project. Additionally, please include links to past completed projects showcasing your Sitecore development skills. We look forward to reviewing your proposal and discussing further details with qualified candidates.
